author: donschoe
content: Thanks for the pointer. I'll address this on the next eth2 call if possible, would be good to get back to a point where all clients work together again.

author: djrtwo
content:
Yup. Time to bring it in.

Something I want to discuss on the call is the state of the aggregation, split subnets, discovery peers of subnets, etc.
Other than getting to `v0.11`, I think this is where the most corners are still being cut and where behavior is still going to diverge.
